values: I posted the Lyrics to "The News Tonight" by Jack Johnson a couple weeks ago. That song makes even more sense after reading this article tonight: http://www.nydailynews.com//front/story/310320p-265498c.html http://www.xanga.com/home.aspx?user=toto247
I made a wallpaper to go with a theme I'm working on. It has some lyrics frorm Say Anything Yellow Cat (Slash) Red Cat. Here it is: http://www.silenceisdefeat.org/~fayt/images/ycwp.jpg
I have a feeling that last night is going to come back and haunt me for awhile.

Here's to the nights we felt alive
Here's to the tears you knew you'd cry
Here's to goodbye 
Tomorrow's gonna come too soon

---

Possibly the saddest chorus.  Ever.

Regardless:  Clean hair;  clean body;  clean mind;  clean life.  You could become famous at any moment and your whole personal history could be unearthed.  And then what would they find?  Turn on the shower.

<!--StartFragment --> I have ants in my bathroom. They're in the walls I think. I've been fighting a losing war with them... and today it took a turn for the worse. I've been spraying the bathroom with Raid. Today I went in there and there was a giant ant. Like the god ant. I drowned him in Raid. A couple hours later I went in there and he was still alive.

I've created a race of mutant ants immune to Raid.

When I think about the future, I think of mutant ants.

Mutant ants and boarded up malls. Shit scattered everywhere.  Nothing new ever being made again.

I wish.

Jen moved out today. It's been a long time coming, and I know it's NEEDED to happen. Doesn't mean I was really prepared for it. I think I'm glad it happened though. Maybe we both were holding eachother back. I know some of you hated her and made judgements... but you didn't know her. It wasn't a one-sided thing. I was just as guilty in this whole mess. "When we sleep at night--when we walk across a field and see a tree full of sleeping birds--when we tell small lies to our friends--when we make love--what acts of surgery are happening to our souls--what damage and healing and shock are we going through that we will never be able to fathom? What films are generated that will never be shown?"
